snippet: European stocks rose on Monday, countering a fall in Asian markets led by weakness in China after a four-day break there.
abstract: FTSEurofirst index of 300 leading shares closes up 0.48 percent at 1,399.34 while MSCI index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan falls 1 percent; trading is light due to Labor Day closure of United States markets.
lead_paragraph: European stocks rose on Monday, countering a fall in Asian markets led by weakness in China after a four-day break there.

headline.main: European Shares Rise, as China Stocks Seesaw Lower
headline.print_headline: European Shares Rise, as China Stocks Seesaw Lower
